fxInfo_notes: Converted from (B) to (A) coding by David Altman.
fxInfo_question: Must a majority across subnational districts (e.g., cantons, provinces, states) be attained in order for a plebiscite to be approved?

fxInfo_responses.value: Yes — at least half of subnational districts.
Yes — more than half of subnational districts.
